articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Small Indian-American community making grand contributions in US: Report - Business Standard
articles.description: The Indian-American community, which has grown to five million in 2023, has broken through many barriers to become one of the most influential immigrant groups in the US now, a report said Thursday, observing that their story is about motivated immigrants and…
articles.content:
Indian Americans account for only 1.5 per cent of the US population, yet they continue to have an outsized and positive impact across different aspects of US society

articles.author: Jake Epstein
articles.title: US Navy warships stuck in Red Sea battle, can't fight Houthis forever - Business Insider
articles.description: American forces have expended a large amount of munitions battling the Houthis, and the conflict doesn't look like it'll end anytime soon.
